languages.text: "Вскоре после падения Райкада Минорис я допросил наместника Футфола. Он дал исчерпывающую информацию о Саргоне и его корабле и предоставил арбитрам полный доступ к докам. Подозреваю, покладистость Токары исходит из вражды с Саргоной. Подонок жрет подонка — ничего нового".

"Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."
languages.original_text: "Вскоре после падения Райкада Минорис я допросил наместника Футфола. Он дал исчерпывающую информацию о Саргоне и его корабле и предоставил арбитрам полный доступ к докам. Подозреваю, покладистость Токары исходит из вражды с Саргоной. Подонок жрет подонка — ничего нового".

traits.locale_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Heretic eating heretic — nothing new there."

I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Heretic eating heretic — nothing new there."

I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

"Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

languages.text: «Poco después de la caída de Rykad Minoris, interrogué al Señor de Paso. Me proporcionó información exhaustiva sobre Sargona y su nave y otorgó acceso completo al puerto a los Arbitrator. Sospecho que la cooperación de Tocara se debe a algún tipo de rencor contra Sargona. Como es habitual, la chusma se vuelve contra sí misma».
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

traits.locale_text: «Poco después de la caída de Rykad Minoris, interrogué al Señor de Paso. Me proporcionó información exhaustiva sobre Sargona y su nave y otorgó acceso completo al puerto a los Arbitrator. Sospecho que la cooperación de Tocara se debe a algún tipo de rencor contra Sargona. Como es habitual, la chusma se vuelve contra sí misma».

languages.text: “小莱卡德毁灭之后没过多久，我就去找了落脚港的总督。他向我提供了萨戈纳的详尽情报，还允许法务官自由进入港口，不受任何阻碍。托卡拉之所以这么配合，我怀疑可能是因为他和萨戈纳之间有什么嫌隙。毕竟，黑吃黑不是什么新鲜事。”
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

traits.locale_text: “小莱卡德毁灭之后没过多久，我就去找了落脚港的总督。他向我提供了萨戈纳的详尽情报，还允许法务官自由进入港口，不受任何阻碍。托卡拉之所以这么配合，我怀疑可能是因为他和萨戈纳之间有什么嫌隙。毕竟，黑吃黑不是什么新鲜事。”

languages.text: « Peu après la chute de Rykad Minoris, j'ai interrogé le suzerain de Castel. Non content de me fournir d'amples informations sur Sargona et son vaisseau, il a également accordé à nos arbitrators libre accès à son port. À mon avis, la complaisance de Tocara est le fruit d'un différend entre lui et Sargona. Les vermines se dévorent entre elles... Rien de nouveau là-dedans. »
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

traits.locale_text: « Peu après la chute de Rykad Minoris, j'ai interrogé le suzerain de Castel. Non content de me fournir d'amples informations sur Sargona et son vaisseau, il a également accordé à nos arbitrators libre accès à son port. À mon avis, la complaisance de Tocara est le fruit d'un différend entre lui et Sargona. Les vermines se dévorent entre elles... Rien de nouveau là-dedans. »

languages.text: 「ライカド・ミノリスの陥落後、私はフットフォールの領主に質問しました。彼はサルゴナと彼の船に関する網羅的な情報を提供して、アービトレイターにドックへのフルアクセスを与えました。トカラの従順さは、彼とサルゴナとの間に何らかの恨みがあることから来ているのではないかと疑っています。ゴミはゴミを食う―何も新しいことはありません」
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド・ミノリスの陥落後、私はフットフォールの領主に質問しました。彼はサルゴナと彼の船に関する網羅的な情報を提供して、アービトレイターにドックへのフルアクセスを与えました。トカラの従順さは、彼とサルゴナとの間に何らかの恨みがあることから来ているのではないかと疑っています。異端者は異端者を食べる―何も新しいことはありません」

languages.text: "Rykad Minoris düştükten kısa süre sonra Binliman Emîri'ni sorguladım. Sargona ve gemisi hakkında bu kapsamlı bilgileri sağladı ve Yargıcılara rıhtıma tam erişim izni verdi. Tocara'nın riayetinin Sargona ile arasındaki husumetten kaynaklandığından şüpheleniyorum. İtin iti yemesi yeni bir şey değil."
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Minoris düştükten kısa süre sonra Binliman Emîri'ni sorguladım. Sargona ve gemisi hakkında bu kapsamlı bilgileri sağladı ve Yargıcılara rıhtıma tam erişim izni verdi. Tocara'nın riayetinin Sargona ile arasındaki husumetten kaynaklandığından şüpheleniyorum. İtin iti yemesi yeni bir şey değil."

languages.text: "Ich habe kurz nach dem Fall von Rykad Minoris den Lehnsherren von Footfall befragt. Er versorgte mich mit umfassenden Informationen über Sargona und sein Schiff und gewährte den Arbitratoren Zugang zu den Docks. Ich vermute, Tocaras Willfährigkeit basierte auf bösem Blut zwischen ihm und Sargona. Abschaum frisst Abschaum – das ist nichts Neues."
languages.original_text: "Shortly after the fall of Rykad Minoris, I questioned the Liege of Footfall. He supplied me with exhaustive information about Sargona and his ship and gave the Arbitrators full access to the docks. I suspect Tocara's compliance stems from some bad blood between him and Sargona. Scum eating scum — nothing new there."
